languages.text: "Тогда вам лучше обратиться к более "изысканным" членам своей свиты".
"Then perhaps you should seek out more 'refined' entertainment from one of the other members of your retinue."
languages.original_text: "Тогда вам лучше обратиться к более "изысканным" членам своей свиты".

traits.locale_text: "Then perhaps you should call upon some of the more 'refined' members of your retinue."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then perhaps you should call upon some of the more 'refined' members of your retinue."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then perhaps you should seek out more 'refined' entertainment from one of the other members of your retinue."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then perhaps you should seek out more 'refined' entertainment from one of the other members of your retinue."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then perhaps you should seek out more 'refined' entertainment from one of the other members of your retinue."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then perhaps you should seek out more 'refined' entertainment from one of the other members of your retinue."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, vous devriez demander à un autre membre de votre entourage de vous offrir un divertissement plus "raffiné". »
languages.original_text: "Then perhaps you should seek out more 'refined' entertainment from one of the other members of your retinue."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, vous devriez demander à un autre membre de votre entourage de vous offrir un divertissement plus "raffiné". »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Entonces tal vez debería buscar un entretenimiento más "refinado" junto a otro miembro de su séquito».
languages.original_text: "Then perhaps you should seek out more 'refined' entertainment from one of the other members of your retinue."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces tal vez debería buscar un entretenimiento más "refinado" junto a otro miembro de su séquito».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “既然这样，那或许你该找其他随行人员，进行更加‘优雅’的娱乐活动。”
languages.original_text: "Then perhaps you should seek out more 'refined' entertainment from one of the other members of your retinue."

traits.locale_text: “既然这样，那或许你该找其他随行人员，进行更加‘优雅’的娱乐活动。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「それなら、もっと『洗練された』エンターテイメントを、従者の誰かに聞くべきかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "Then perhaps you should seek out more 'refined' entertainment from one of the other members of your retinue."

traits.locale_text: 「それなら、もっと『洗練された』エンターテイメントを、従者の誰かに聞くべきかもしれません」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Dann solltet Ihr vielleicht 'kultiviertere' Unterhaltung von einem der anderen Mitglieder Eures Gefolges erbitten."
languages.original_text: "Then perhaps you should seek out more 'refined' entertainment from one of the other members of your retinue."

traits.locale_text: "Dann solltet Ihr vielleicht 'kultiviertere' Unterhaltung von einem der anderen Mitglieder Eures Gefolges erbitten."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "O hâlde belki de maiyetindeki diğerlerinden daha 'rafine' bir eğlence talep etmelisin."
languages.original_text: "Then perhaps you should seek out more 'refined' entertainment from one of the other members of your retinue."
